pkgmetadata.longdescription: Southern Ocean Frontal Distributions (Orsi) // A data set package with the "Orsi" and "Park/Durand" fronts as 'SpatialLinesDataFrame' objects. The Orsi et al. (1995) fronts are published at the Southern Ocean Atlas Database Page, and the Park et al. (2019) fronts are published at the 'SEANOE' Altimetry-derived Antarctic Circumpolar Current fronts page, please see package CITATION for details.
